title: Freight forwarder liability insurance certificates
dataVerified: Freight forwarder, insurance company, coverage limits, cargo types
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake freight forwarder insurance. Domain binding verifies insurance company. Shipper verification of forwarder liability coverage. High cargo values ($100K-$10M+ typical).
